&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return if @@form = '013' or @@form = '014' begin exec rs_PrintPSTranMultiCopies @stt_rec, @@id, 'm86$$partition$current', 'd86$$partition$current', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, '@@sysDatabaseName'&externalMasterDetail;&PrintVATType; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(128), @l char(1), @formTypeIRS tinyint, @mau_hddt varchar(33), @so_seri_hddt varchar(33), @so_ct_hddt varchar(33) select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' if @@form in ('620', '622', '640', '642', '020', '120') select @l = 'V', @formTypeIRS = 1 else select @l = @@language, @formTypeIRS = 0
if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_sd_hddt' and val = '1') begin select @mau_hddt = mau_hddt, @so_seri_hddt = so_seri_hddt, @so_ct_hddt = so_ct_hddt from hddt00$$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec if @so_ct_hddt = '' begin select @mau_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI001' select @so_seri_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI002' select @so_ct_hddt = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'EI003' end end
&ISTranSqlIf; begin declare @tk_vt varchar(128), @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128) select @tk_vt = '' select @tk_vt = @tk_vt + rtrim(a.tk_vt) + ', ' from (select distinct tk_vt from d86$$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec) a select @tk_vt = left(@tk_vt, len(@tk_vt) - 1)
select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC017' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC018' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC019' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC020'
select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then a.ong_ba else case when @l = 'V' then b.ten_kh else b.ten_kh2 end end as ong_ba , case when a.ong_ba <> '' then a.ong_ba else b.ten_kh2 end as ong_ba2 , b.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, c.ma_kho, isnull(d.dia_chi,'') dia_diem, ltrim(a.so_ct) so_ct, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt , dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, @l) as t_tien_in_word , dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, @l) as t_tien_nt_in_word , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'E') else '' end t_tien_in_word2 , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'E') else '' end t_tien_nt_in_word2 , replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 , @tk_vt as tk_co, a.tk as tk_no, isnull(e.so_ct_goc, 0) as so_ct_goc, isnull(e.dien_giai_ct_goc, '') as dien_giai_ct_goc , a.dien_giai, case when @l = 'V' then d.ten_kho else d.ten_kho2 end as ten_kho, d.ten_kho2 , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join d86$$partition$current c with(nolock) on (a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec and c.stt_rec0 = (select min(stt_rec0) from d86$$partition$current with(nolock) where stt_rec = a.stt_rec)) left join dmkho d with(nolock) on c.ma_kho = d.ma_kho left join v00$$partition$current e on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintISTran @@language, @key, 'd86$$partition$current', @@id, @formTypeIRS&externalDetail; end else begin if @@form = '011' or @@form = '021' begin select a.ong_ba as doi_tac, a.ma_kh, b.ten_kh as ten_kh, b.ten_kh2 as ten_kh2, b.ma_so_thue, b.dia_chi, b.tk_nh, b.ngan_hang, b.tinh_thanh, c.ten_ngan as thanh_toan, c.ten_ngan2 as thanh_toan2, case when @@language = 'V' then N'1: Lưu' else '1: Backup' end as so_lien, isnull(@mau_hddt, isnull(k.ky_hieu, '')) as ky_hieu, isnull(@so_seri_hddt, a.so_seri) as so_seri, isnull(@so_ct_hddt, a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ngay_ct, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Einvoice$GetTaxRateName(d.thue_suat) as thue_suat, a.ma_nt, a.t_tien as t_tien2, a.t_tien_nt as t_tien_nt2, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @@language) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @@language) as t_tt_nt_in_word, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, a.dien_giai , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtt c with(nolock) on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt left join dmthue d with(nolock) on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue left join v20dmnk k with(nolock) on a.ma_nk = k.ma_nk &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintPSTran @@language, @key, 'd86$$partition$current', @@id, @formTypeIRS, 1, 0&externalDetail; end else begin select a.ong_ba, ltrim(rtrim(a.ma_kh)) as ma_kh, b.ten_kh, b.ten_kh2, b.dia_chi, isnull(@so_ct_hddt, ltrim(a.so_ct)) as so_ct , a.dien_giai, a.ma_nx, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt , dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word , dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') else '' end t_tt_in_word2 , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') else '' end t_tt_nt_in_word2 , replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , &Master.XMLSelect; as customize from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh &Master.Join; where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintPSTran @@language, @key, 'd86$$partition$current', @@id, @formTypeIRS, 0, 0&externalDetail; end end end
&ISTranPrintPortrait; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;
